translations: adj.（细胞或细胞内物质）易被基本染料着色的

sentences.sentence: Which may be a novel mechanism of amplification of basophil activation signal.
sentences.translation: 具有放大嗜碱性粒细胞激活信号的作用。

sentences.sentence: This is an excellent review of current research in mast cell and basophil biology.
sentences.translation: 本书是关于肥大细胞和嗜碱性粒细胞生物学近期研究进展的很好的综述。

sentences.sentence: Methods Skin tests with autologous serum and basophil histamine-release assay (BHRA) were performed.
sentences.translation: 方法自身血清皮肤试验和嗜碱性粒细胞组胺释放试验。
